Virus Diseases/Arbovirus Infections/Tick-Borne Diseases/Colorado Tick Fever
Record.Description: A febrile illness characterized by chills, aches, vomiting, leukopenia, and sometimes encephalitis. It is caused by the COLORADO TICK FEVER VIRUS, a reovirus transmitted by the tick Dermacentor andersoni.
